subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Boston College crushed Minnesota, 6-1, and Ferris State beat Union College, 3-1, in the national semifinals of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.
snippet: Boston College crushed Minnesota, 6-1, and Ferris State beat Union College, 3-1, in the national semifinals of the Division I men’s ice hockey tournament.
